text:
I've tried to install the Apache 2.0.45 MSI package for Win32 platforms on a 
Windows 2000 Server v5.00.2195 with Service Pack 3 installed. When I press the 
button 'Install' to begin the installation I get an "Internal Error 2755. 3," 
message from the installer; this error appears whatever install options I 
choose.

The Windows event browser just gives me the following message:
Product: Apache HTTP Server 2.0.45 -- Internal Error 2755. 3, 
E:\paquetes\Apache\apache_2.0.45-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi 

The MSI package installs properly on a Windows 2000 Professional v5.00.2195 
with Service Pack 3 installed.
creator: jcarlos@alc.es
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Please read this page;

    http://www.apache.org/dist/httpd/binaries/win32/TROUBLESHOOTING.html

  Sorry for the MS oversights.  More hints may be available in the knowledge
  base, if you find another article instead that helps you, please note it in
  this bug report so we can update that page.
